div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 40 Arcadia ?, c. 1932 (61) Burial: late 5th cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 91 AR Thebes: 1 dr.; 2 triob. Aegina: 4 st. Phlius: 1 triob. Sicyon: 1 dr. Argos: 8 triob. Arcadia: 74 triob. Disposition: formerly J. P. Shear coll. (stolen Dec. 1968). Prints of 48 Ar- cadian triob. on file in ANS Information on file in ANS
